name: Marbles Garden
description:
Shoot and match marbles to protect your beautiful garden agains evil golems.

Marbles Garden is match-3 marble shooter puzzle.

The goal is to protect your beautiful garden against evil golems.  Special projectiles and other bonuses, which you can upgrade during the game for collected stars, will also help you with that.

Game features:
★ 60 beautiful levels,
★ 14 upgradable powerups,
★ live environment,
★ epic music
